Some time ago I wrote (probably under the sight “delta_5”) that I had created a sight that War Thunder couldn’t render. I fixed it, and personally I think it didn’t turn out as well as the original. maybe some of might like it, but I consider it weak :<

#delta #eminence_in_shadow #anime #goonersight

The sight of the PT-76B tank is called TSHK-2-66, and it is one of the 27 sights on the tank's grid. I am currently drawing the original grid of one of the PT-76 tanks in the museum. #sight #wtdraw #realistic #historical
#Daebom #breda #breda_501 #anime

i have studied, i have poured over thousands of texts written by warthunder's brightest minds, and with the wealth of knowledge i have collected and compiled, i have created the closest thing a normal person will ever get, to seeing what a german main sees.

i present:

THE GERMAN MAIN EXPERIENCE!

#shitpost #joke

#pokemon #umbreon #eeveelutions
For anyone who can take care of him, enjoy!

this is my first custom sight so i hope all who are loyal to the emperor enjoy it!

this is the imperial aquilla from warhammer40k, may all who serve the emperor fight with this as their gunsight, and may it drive back the heretic, the mutant, the witch, and the alien

#warhammer40k #wh40k #imperium

This was specifically requested by ItzRainyBoy. This is also his work which is an OC named Nadia. Actually happy he requested because I enjoy his sound mods. Give him some support for RWSM V! Let me know if there are problems, I did upload this from my phone. Also will take a break from feet for a bit and work on other Nadia sights. I got about 4 more to do and will go back to feet soon lmao

#wtdraw #sight #nadia #ItzRainyBoy #anime

#preset
This is a 50% opaque pre-set wit purple NV colour and pink Thermal colour. When configuring the sight settings in game crosshair lighting will always display at full opacity.
Some sights might show strange shapes like in the Gorillaz sight shown on the last photo, that is because when being made in warthunder draw they overlapped some of the solid sections that then stack when each get set to 50% opacity. you can change the colour by editing the hexadecimal code and it shouldn't change the opacity, 000000 for black and ffffff for white, each colour value has 2 slots. red is the firs ...
